verbose_text: In the present study, we noted a significant reduction in the mRNA and protein expression of GLUT4 in C2C12 cells transfected with miR-29a-GFP-pGLPZ (miR-29a group) compared with C2C12 cells which had not been transfected (normal group) and C2C12 cells transfected with GFP-pGLPZ lentivirus (control group) (P < 0.05) (XREF_FIG).
